hero.title: saneatsu.me
hero.description: Articles about programming, development tools, and daily insights on technology and lifestyle.

current.title: Current Activities
current.description: Through personal project development, I focus on learning new technologies and practicing best practices.

focus.title: Areas of Focus
focus.description: I'm particularly interested in modern web application development, performance optimization, and improving developer experience.

error.title: An error occurred
error.message: Sorry, an unexpected error has occurred.

notFound.title: Article not found
notFound.message: The article you're looking for doesn't exist or may have been deleted.

invalidString.email: Please enter a valid email address
invalidString.ip: Please enter a valid IP address

article.titleTooLong: Title must be 200 characters or less
article.contentTooLong: Content must be 50000 characters or less
article.slugInvalid: Slug can only contain alphanumeric characters and hyphens
article.atLeastOneTranslation: Please create an article in at least one language

pagination.pagePositive: Page number must be a positive integer

common.slugTooLong: Slug must be 100 characters or less
common.slugInvalid: Slug can only contain lowercase alphanumeric characters and hyphens
common.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
common.datetimeInvalid: Please enter a valid datetime format
common.idPositive: ID must be a positive integer

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: saneatsu.me (the 'Site') respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle personal information on our Site.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We may collect the following information:

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.content: We use the collected information for user authentication, service provision and improvement, and responding to inquiries. We do not provide information to third parties except as required by law.

dataSecurity.title: Data Protection
dataSecurity.content: We manage personal information appropriately and implement necessary and appropriate security measures to prevent unauthorized access, loss, damage, alteration, or leakage.

cookies.title: Use of Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve user experience. If you do not wish to use cookies, you can disable them in your browser settings.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We use third-party services such as Google authentication. When using these services, the privacy policies of each service apply.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For inquiries about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through the contact form on the Site.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: This Privacy Policy may be changed as necessary. Any changes will be announced on the Site.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using saneatsu.me (the 'Site'), you are deemed to have agreed to these Terms of Service.

service.title: Service Description
service.content: The Site is a web service that provides technical articles and blog content. Service content may change without notice.

userObligations.title: User Obligations
userObligations.content: Users must comply with the following when using the Site:

items.lawful: Not engage in activities that violate laws or public order and morals
items.respectful: Not infringe on the rights of other users or third parties
items.security: Not engage in unauthorized access or activities that burden the system

items.illegal: Activities related to illegal acts or criminal acts
items.harmful: Activities that damage the reputation or credibility of others

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property Rights
intellectualProperty.content: The copyright of the content on the Site (text, images, programs, etc.) belongs to the Site or legitimate rights holders. Unauthorized copying, reproduction, or modification is prohibited.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The Site does not guarantee the accuracy or completeness of the information provided. The Site assumes no responsibility for any damages arising from the use of the Site.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: The Site is not responsible for damages caused by interruption, suspension, termination, change, or unavailability of the service.

termination.title: Termination of Use
termination.content: If a user violates these Terms, the Site may suspend the use of the service without prior notice.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with Japanese law.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: These Terms may be changed as necessary. Changed terms become effective when posted on the Site.
